remarks: Proportionality property of the norm of a scalar product in a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvs.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvs.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvs.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvs $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A S B ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
